roleset.name: offer, give
roleset.note: PROFFER-V NOTES: 'Proffer' is really just a pretentious way of saying 'offer'. (from proffer.01-v)

example.name: one what?
example.text: To hear most U.S. growers tell it, we'd still be in Paradise if the serpent had proffered one to Eve.

example.name: missing recipient
example.text: Los Angeles financier Marvin Davis, who put United in play with a $5.4 billion bid two months ago, last night proffered both a ray of hope and an extra element of uncertainty by saying he remains interested in acquiring UAL.
